# Solana Intelligence Toolkit | Generated by GPT 5.1 with prompt by Bhaskar K

This repository contains two projects:

- `backend/` — Node + TypeScript backend exposing REST endpoints and an MCP WebSocket endpoint.
- `frontend/` — React + Vite frontend with a polished UI (dark mode, sidebar, charts).

See each subfolder for detailed instructions to run locally and deploy to Render.
